metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2041 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libraries/common.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.13, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.3, and 4.5.x before 4.5.4 does not use a constant-time algorithm for comparing CSRF tokens, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions by measuring time differences.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.4-1').
